dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S123 IS: Obamacare Taxpayer Bailout Prevention Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Rubio (for himself, Mr. Flake, Mr. Inhofe, Mr. Lee, Mr. McCain, Mr. Paul, Mr. Roberts, Mr. Rounds, and Mr. Vitter) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To prevent a taxpayer bailout of health insurance issuers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Obamacare Taxpayer Bailout Prevention Act.

section.header: Prevention of bailout of health insurance issuers
section.text: The Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act is amended by striking section 1342 (42 U.S.C. 18062).
